Subject: Oh Joyous Day! The adventurers return home!

Brix/Fliq

Brix turned to the others.

"We're ready. Ramulus, if you've been sick before, you'll definity be 
sick now. There's nothing like entering an atmosphere. It's worse 
than leaving. And we don't even know if what we have will hold. I'll 
send a long message to the Ark. I hope it will make it. It'll 
probably come in cracky, but they'll understand."

Brix opened a channel.

"Ark, this is the shuttle Iron Ram. Onboard we have Brix, Fliq and 
Ramulus. We have completed our mission on the moon to collect parts 
to rebuild The Ark. Please be prepared for our arrival."

Brix began descent.......
